Articles.Content:
Uninstalled everything (KSP and nvidia) Started from scratch, luancher is still broken but the game runs from the .exe now

 

i cant run the launcher or the game itself, they open for a minute but the launcher just closes and the game crashes almost right away.

Kerbal Space Program [version: Unity 2017.1.3p1 (02d73f71d3bd)]

nvd3dumx.dll caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005)
  in module nvd3dumx.dll at 0033:43de7d87.

Error occurred at 2018-09-14_081438.
C:\KSP_win64\KSP_x64.exe, run by Me.
53% memory in use.
8061 MB physical memory [3710 MB free].
11517 MB paging file [5813 MB free].
134217728 MB user address space [134212242 MB free].
Read from location 00000000 caused an access violation.

 

Reset the nvidia settings and it did... something, getting this now

Unity Player [version: Unity 5.2.4f1_98095704e6fe]

Launcher.exe caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005)
  in module Launcher.exe at 0023:00f1a0f7.

Error occurred at 2018-09-16_143312.
C:\KSP_win64\Launcher.exe, run by Me.
66% memory in use.
0 MB physical memory [2731 MB free].
0 MB paging file [3319 MB free].
0 MB user address space [3557 MB free].
Read from location 00000000 caused an access violation.

Edited September 16, 2018 by Deralek

5 hours ago, Deralek said:

nvd3dumx.dll

This appears to be an Nvidea driver.   Update it and see if it works.

On 9/14/2018 at 2:24 PM, Gargamel said:

This appears to be an Nvidea driver.   Update it and see if it works. 

 

Everything seems to be updated

On 9/14/2018 at 11:28 AM, Deralek said:

luancher is still broken

Launcher has been broken for a number of years now.   Don't use it.
